meanings.definition: A person who engages in daring or reckless activities for enjoyment or thrill.
meanings.sent1: The daredevils performed stunts on their motorcycles at the show.
meanings.sent2: The daredevils at the circus amazed the audience with their risky acts.
meanings.sent3: The daredevils decided to have a competition to see who could do the craziest stunt.
meanings.sent4: She was a daredevil on the ski slopes, fearlessly tackling the most challenging runs.
meanings.sent5: The group of daredevils set out to conquer the treacherous mountain peak together.

meanings.definition: To act recklessly or boldly without regard for danger or consequences.
meanings.sent1: He daredevils his way through life, always seeking excitement and thrills.
meanings.sent2: They daredevils into the unknown, eager to explore new territories.
meanings.sent3: She daredevils her way through the obstacle course, not caring about the muddy mess.
meanings.sent4: The entrepreneur daredevils into the competitive market, taking risks to succeed.
meanings.sent5: The cat daredevils across the room, leaping from one piece of furniture to another.
